query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_campaigns (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  campaign_type ENUM('candidate_nurturing', 'interview_reminder', 'follow_up', 'onboarding', 'engagement', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  template_id INT NOT NULL,
  schedule_type ENUM('immediate', 'scheduled', 'recurring', 'trigger_based') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'scheduled',
  scheduled_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  recurring_pattern JSON,
  trigger_event ENUM('application_received', 'interview_scheduled', 'interview_completed', 'days_after_application', 'days_before_interview', 'custom'),
  trigger_delay INT,
  target_audience JSON,
  status ENUM('draft', 'active', 'paused', 'completed', 'cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  total_recipients INT DEFAULT 0,
  sent_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  opened_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  clicked_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_by INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  last_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL
)
command:

  trigger_delay INT,
  target_audience JSON,
  status ENUM('draft', 'active', 'paused', 'completed', 'cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  total_recipients INT DEFAULT 0,
  sent_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  opened_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  clicked_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_by INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  last_sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL
)
